title: 'Ida': A Young Woman's Search For Identity In 1962 Poland
teaser: Ida is a Polish film about a young woman who was raised as an orphan in a convent. She's planning to take her vows as a nun when she discovers she's Jewish and her parents were killed by the Nazis.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
